biotools.summary: FERMO is a metabolomics dashboard  designed to facilitate hypothesis-driven prioritization of molecules and samples, and integrates LC-MS metabolomics data with phenotype information, sample grouping, and genomic data. FERMO is applicable in a variety of biological sciences, including natural product drug discovery, microbiology, or agriculture.
